snippet.title: Yupitergrad 2: the Lost Station | Launch Trailer | Meta Quest 2 + Rift
snippet.description:
Yupitergrad 2: The Lost Station has landed - bigger and stronger. Explore a space station full of rogue machines, use new gadgets, free your companion AIsha, and experience an epic adventure in this full-scale metroidvania for VR.

Yupitergrad 2 combines metroidvania-style gameplay with a unique experience that is only possible with VR headsets. Thanks to the unique model of moving on ropes with suction cups, you will feel like an action movie hero.  You will experience all these extraordinary, memorable moments with your companion AIsha, whose voice will help you find yourself on an abandoned space station.

Action, humor, exploration, shooting - all of this is now coming to Meta Quest and Meta Rift.
